description: This file contains a seed function 'seedLessons' that upserts static course lesson data into a database table 'course_lessons'. It includes example lesson data for multiple courses and handles batch processing, error handling, and relies on external functions for database access and environment checks.

methods.name: seedLessons
methods.description: Asynchronously upserts course lesson data into the database, with optional custom data sets, handling batching and error propagation.
